Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.inference

The inference package contains classes to check to see if changes made to a rationale element result in status changes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AlternativeInferences Handles inferencing (evaluation, error checking, ...) at the alternative level.
AlternativePatternInferences  
AlternativePatternInferences.MyComparator  
ArgumentInferences Handles inferencing (evaluation, error checking...) when the argument or someone associated with it is modified.
AssumptionInferences Performs inferences when an assumption is updated.
ClaimInferences Performs any necessary inferences when a claim is deleted or modified.
DecisionInferences Performs necessary inference when a decision or something dependent on a decision changes.
OntologyInferences Performs any inferences needed when an ontology entry is modified
QuestionInferences Performs any necessary inferences when a question is changed.
RequirementInferences Performs any necessary inference when a requirement is changed.
TradeoffInferences Performs any inferences needed when a tradeoff is modified.
UpdateManager The update manager handles any updates that need to be made to the rationale tree when there is a status change.
 

Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.inference Description

The inference package contains classes to check to see if changes made to a rationale element result in status changes.
